CustomField.description:
E2B (R2): B.4.k.5.5, drugintervaldosagedefinition (3AN)
E2B (R3): G.k.4.r.3 Definition of the Time Interval Unit Conformance: Optional, but required if G.k.4.r.2 is populated. Data Type: 50AN OID: 2.16.840.1.113883.3.989.2.1.1.26 Value Allowed: Constrained UCUM codes:{cyclical}, {asnecessary},{total}
CustomField.inlineHelpText: Example: 5 mg 2 times a day every other day for 30 days Dose (number): 5 Dose (unit): mg Separate Dosages: 2 Interval: 2 Interval Unit: day Cumulative Dose to First Reaction (number): 150 Cumulative Dose to First Reaction (unit): mg
CustomField.label: Dosage Interval (Units)
